systemRules.title: Business Rules

workerCreation.title: Activist Creation Permissions
workerCreation.description: Who can create workers in the system

reasons.superAdmin: Strategic role - not involved in day-to-day operations
reasons.areaManager: Regional manager - no direct HR responsibility
reasons.cityManager: Full responsibility for human resource management
reasons.activistCoordinator: Can manage existing workers but not recruit new ones

hierarchy.title: Organizational Hierarchy
hierarchy.superAdminResp: Manage entire system and all corporations
hierarchy.managerResp: Full management of corporation including sites, supervisors and workers
hierarchy.supervisorResp: Daily management of workers in assigned sites

roleCapabilities.title: Capabilities by Role
roleCapabilities.description: What each role can do in the system

accessScope.title: Data Access Scope
accessScope.description: What data each role can see and manage
accessScope.superAdminScopeExplain: Can see and manage all corporations, sites and workers without restrictions
accessScope.managerScopeExplain: Can only see and manage their corporation, including all sites, supervisors and workers within it
accessScope.supervisorScopeExplain: Can only see and manage workers in specific sites assigned by the manager
accessScope.workerScopeExplain: Activists are not system users - they are information records managed by supervisors

multiTenant.title: City Isolation
multiTenant.description: Separation and protection rules between corporations
multiTenant.fullIsolationExplain: Each corporation operates as a separate system - no ability to see or access other corporations' data
multiTenant.managerBoundaryExplain: Manager can only see and manage their corporation - no access to other corporations even if authorized
multiTenant.supervisorBoundaryExplain: Activist Coordinator can only see sites explicitly assigned to them - cannot see other sites even in the same corporation
multiTenant.superAdminExceptionExplain: Only Super Admin can see and manage multiple corporations - this is a unique system role

creationPermissions.title: Who Can Create What in the System?
creationPermissions.description: Detailed creation permissions matrix for each role - based on business requirements
creationPermissions.superAdminAreaManagerOrCityCoord: Super Admin, Area Manager, or City Coordinator (same city)
creationPermissions.allExceptActivistCoord: Super Admin, Area Manager, City Coordinator, or Activist Coordinator (assigned neighborhoods only)
creationPermissions.superAdminExplain: Critical system role - created only via database script. Never created via UI or API to prevent accidental creation.
creationPermissions.areaManagerExplain: Regional manager - only Super Admin can create area managers to maintain regional hierarchy control.
creationPermissions.cityCoordinatorExplain: City coordinator - can be created by Super Admin or Area Manager. City coordinators are responsible for managing their city.
creationPermissions.activistCoordinatorExplain: Activist coordinator - can be created by Super Admin, Area Manager, or City Coordinator in the same city. Must belong to a specific city.
creationPermissions.neighborhoodExplain: Neighborhood - can be created by Super Admin, Area Manager, or City Coordinator in the same city. Neighborhoods belong to one city.
creationPermissions.activistExplain: Activist - can be created by Super Admin, Area Manager, City Coordinator, or Activist Coordinator (only in assigned neighborhoods). Activist Coordinator is limited to their assigned neighborhoods.
creationPermissions.cityExplain: City - can be created by Super Admin or Area Manager. Cities are primary regional units in the system.

modificationRights.title: Data Modification Rights
modificationRights.description: Who can create, edit, and delete entities in the system
modificationRights.superAdminManagerActivist Coordinator: Super Admin, City Coordinator, and Activist Coordinator (assigned sites only)

systemRules.importantNote: These rules ensure proper management, separation between corporations, and clear responsibility at every level. Any changes require management approval.
